amendment.description: An amendment numbered 104 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to allow for an arbitration process for those disputing their eligibility for assistance, or repayment of assistance, following a disaster.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
